title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: The heart is remarkably resilient. A present or past romantic relationship resurrects strong emotions that you believed were buried. Possibly a quarrel, sparked by jealousy or controlling tendencies, triggers fears about the future of your bond. Or, an encounter with someone from your past leaves you with unresolved feelings. Resist the impulse to make dramatic proclamations or to obsess about what might happen next. Embrace your current sentiments with some solitude now. Chances are your inflamed passions just need time to settle. Once clarity returns, let love -- not fear, anger, or regret -- lead you forward. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
